mapper.select: select c_no as cNo, c_name as cName from code where relation_code = 'A' order by 1 asc
select duty||' '||empName as headDept, phoneNumber from emplist_view where deptNo = #{cNo} and isadmin = 'T'
select count(*) from employee e, employee_code ec, code c where e.emp_no = ec.emp_no and c.c_no = ec.c_no and c.c_no like '%' || #{cNo} || '%'
select count(c_no) from code where relation_code in (select c_no from code where relation_code = (select c_no from code where c_name = '부서') and c_no = #{cNo})
